termsAndConditions.description1: The registration for an YKI test is binding. Once you have confirmed your registration, you can no longer change it.
termsAndConditions.description2: Check that you are registering for a test of the correct language and level.
termsAndConditions.label: I accept the terms and conditions for registration *

registrationDetails.title: Fill in your personal information

whatsNext.description: After you have sent the registration form, you will receive a payment link by email to pay your test fee. The registration will be confirmed after you have paid the test fee.
whatsNext.title: What happens next?

proceedToPayment.confirmation: You have sent the registration form for the YKI test

dueDateReminder.text1: Important! The message will also contain the due date for paying the test fee.
dueDateReminder.text2: To participate in the YKI test, you must pay the fee on time.

paymentLinkEmail.text1: Next, you will receive an email with a payment link.
paymentLinkEmail.text2: The email is sent from the address noreply@opintopolku.fi.
paymentLinkEmail.text3: Your registration will be confirmed only after you have paid the test fee.

proceedToPayment.title: Confirm the registration by paying the test fee

identify.caption: You must identify yourself to register for a YKI test. Use the personal information of the person taking the YKI test for the identification.

emailLink.error: Identification failed. You may try again.
emailLink.success: Registration link has been sent to:

identify.registrationIsBindingAdvisory: Check that you are registering for the correct YKI test (including language and level). Registration for YKI test is binding. Once you have confirmed your registration, you can no longer change it.
identify.title: Identify yourself for registration

withFinnishSSN.info: After the identification you will be directed automatically to the registration form.

withoutFinnishSSN.description: If you cannot use Suomi.fi e-identification, identify yourself with your email.
withoutFinnishSSN.info: After the identification, you will receive an email with a link to the registration form.

cancel.description: You registration will be confirmed only after you have paid the test fee.
cancel.heading: Payment was cancelled

error.description: You may try to pay again. You registration will be confirmed only after you have paid the test fee.
error.heading: Payment error

beforeYkiTest.description: To prepare for the YKI test, you can read the instructions provided by the Finnish National Agency for Education on their website:
beforeYkiTest.label: Before the YKI test (oph.fi)

whatsNext.part1: Your registration has been confirmed! You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
whatsNext.part2: Closer to the test date, your test centre will send you an email with detailed instructions on arriving at the test, including the exact location and start time.

specialArrangements.description: If you need special arrangements, send your application as soon as possible according to the instructions provided by the Finnish National Agency for Education. The instructions can be found on their website:
specialArrangements.label: Do you need special arrangements? (oph.fi)

whatsNext.title: Welcome to the YKI test!

alreadyRegistered.description: You can register for only one YKI test on the same test day.
alreadyRegistered.title: You have already registered for another YKI test on the same test day

full.description: Registration is not possible at the moment. There are no available seats for this test.
full.title: The test is full

generic.description: Submitting the registration form failed. You can return to the registration form and try again.
generic.title: Submitting the registration form failed

past.description: Registration is not possible anymore. The registration period has ended.
past.title: Registration period has ended

upcoming.description: Registration is not possible at the moment. The registration period has not started yet.
upcoming.title: Registration has not started

evaluationOrderPage.notFound: Information about the reassessment was not found!
evaluationOrderPage.title: Request a reassessment

toasts.loadingError: Information about the reassessment could not be loaded!

cancel.heading: Payment was cancelled
cancel.info: You may try to pay again. We will only process paid requests for reassessment.

error.heading: Payment error
error.info: The payment did not go through. You may try again.

success.heading: You have requested a reassessment!
success.body: You have received a confirmation of your request for reassessment by email. The message also contains a receipt of the reassessment fee. If you have not received the message, please check your spam folder.

logoutSuccessPage.heading: Log out complete
logoutSuccessPage.info: You have logged out successfully. Close all browser windows.

notFoundPage.description: Please check the website address or return to the front page.
notFoundPage.title: Page not found

general.body1: In the reassessment, your test answers will be evaluated again. The reassessment will be conducted by different assessors than those who assessed your YKI test the first time.
general.body2: The reassessment rarely changes the proficiency level assessment of a subtest. See previous statistics on the website of the Finnish National Agency for Education:
general.body3: The reassessment only concerns your YKI test answers. It will not take into account any other factors that may have affected the test results. The decision on a reassessment may not be appealed.
general.heading: What is a reassessment?

pricing.body1: You can request a reassessment of one subtest or several subtests. The reassessment fee is 100 euros per subtest. The fee must be paid when you submit your request for a reassessment. The request will be processed only if the fee has been paid.
pricing.body2: You can request a reassessment within 14 days when you have had the opportunity to receive your YKI test results. The list at the end of this page contains the test days for which you can currently submit a request for a reassessment.
pricing.body3: The average processing time is approximately three months. The results of the reassessment will be sent to you by email.
pricing.body4: The fee will be refunded if the reassessment changes the assessment of the subtest.
pricing.heading: How to request and pay for a reassessment

introduction.info: You can submit a claim for correction if you are not satisfied with the assessment of your YKI test. A claim for correction means a reassessment of your YKI test. You can submit a request for a reassessment on this page.
introduction.timeLimit: You can request a reassessment within 14 days after you have had the opportunity to receive your YKI test results.

reassessmentPage.title: National Certificates of Language Proficiency (YKI) - Reassessment

actions.cancel: I do not want to quit
actions.confirm: Yes, I want to quit the registration

abortDialog.description: Do you want to quit the registration? Any information you have filled in will be lost.
abortDialog.title: Quit registration

part1.text: The National Certificates of Language Proficiency (YKI) test measures functional language proficiency in everyday situations. You can officially prove your language skills in different languages with a National Certificate of Language Proficiency.

link.label: Selecting the right YKI test and the test days

part2.text: You can take the YKI test at the basic level, intermediate level, or advanced level. Before registering for the test, find out when you need the certificate and at what level. Read more about selecting the right YKI test on the website of the Finnish National Agency for Education:

part3.text: If you need special arrangements in YKI test, please read the instructions on the website of the Finnish National Agency for Education:

examSessionListing.noResults: No YKI tests were found. You may try again.

errorDialog.description: Select first the language and level. Click on the SEARCH button.
errorDialog.title: Select the language and level

filters.heading: Search for tests
filters.information: Search for a suitable YKI test by selecting the language and level. Click on the SEARCH button to see the results.

labels.excludeFullSessions: Show only the tests that have available seats
labels.excludeNonOpenSessions: Show only the tests that are open for registration at the moment

registrationPage.title: National Certificates of Language Proficiency (YKI) - Registration
